titleStmt.title: [Interrogatories vpon which ... churchwardens shalbe charged, for searche, of al such things as now be amysse.]
Visitation articles. 1558
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robart Caly, wythin the precinct of Christes Hospitall,
publicationStmt.date: The .vi. day of Aprill. M. D. LVIII. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum] [1558]

notesStmt.note: Title from STC; imprint from colophon.
Copies differ; in this copy the "A" of signature A2 is under "al" of "allowed"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
